author: danielf
msg: * Made the ResourceReader and ImageReader Spring configurable and created Spring configurations for them.
* Kept all the Avalon support for keeping back compatibility.
* I had to some kludgy hack for the logging and moved the CLLoggerWrapper to a the util module to support this.
* It would probably neater to factor out the POJO part from the ResourceReader to a ResourceReaderBean, but that can wait until later.
